title: Anterior Cervical Discectomy and Fusion (ACDF)
description: Comprehensive demonstration of single-level ACDF technique including approach, discectomy, decompression, and plate fixation.

title: Posterior Lumbar Interbody Fusion (PLIF)
description: Step-by-step guide to PLIF procedure including facetectomy, neural decompression, disc preparation, and cage placement.

title: Lumbar Laminectomy for Spinal Stenosis
description: Decompressive laminectomy technique with preservation of facet joints and demonstration of nerve root decompression.

title: Thoracic Pedicle Screw Placement
description: Detailed anatomical approach to safe thoracic pedicle screw insertion using fluoroscopic guidance and free-hand technique.

title: Minimally Invasive TLIF (MIS-TLIF)
description: Modern minimally invasive approach to transforaminal lumbar interbody fusion with tubular retractor system.

title: Adult Spinal Deformity Correction
description: Multi-level posterior spinal fusion with osteotomies for adult scoliosis correction and sagittal balance restoration.

title: C1-C2 Posterior Fusion for Atlantoaxial Instability
description: Surgical technique for atlantoaxial fusion using C1 lateral mass and C2 pedicle screw fixation.

title: Thoracic Disc Herniation: Transthoracic Approach
description: Open thoracotomy approach for thoracic disc herniation with careful neural protection and disc removal.

title: Vertebroplasty for Osteoporotic Compression Fracture
description: Percutaneous vertebroplasty technique with fluoroscopic guidance for painful vertebral compression fractures.

title: Lateral Lumbar Interbody Fusion (LLIF)
description: Lateral retroperitoneal approach to lumbar spine with neuromonitoring and interbody cage placement.

title: Corpectomy and Anterior Column Reconstruction
description: Anterior thoracolumbar corpectomy for metastatic disease with expandable cage and anterior plating.

title: Pediatric Scoliosis Correction with Growing Rods
description: Growing rod technique for early-onset scoliosis including initial placement and lengthening procedures.

title: Sacroiliac Joint Fusion
description: Minimally invasive SI joint fusion technique using triangular titanium implants for chronic SI joint dysfunction.

title: Revision Lumbar Surgery: Hardware Removal and Extension
description: Complex revision case demonstrating hardware removal, pseudarthrosis repair, and fusion extension.

title: Cervical Laminoplasty for Multilevel Stenosis
description: Open-door laminoplasty technique preserving posterior cervical musculature and maintaining motion.
